en: Frost and freezing rain: the weather service warns of slippery roads. The winter weather has arrived in Germany: The German Weather Service in Offenbach warned on Sunday of black ice, especially in the south of the country. It should snow in the western half of the country from Sunday afternoon. Snow and later freezing rain...
